column1: nna botlolo yaka e palesa mme
mme na ntho e ke ferefe
mme tsebo onkile namune ya ngwana
mme hakere tseo ke ha tsenetu ale monyane
mme dipoone ke tsane tsenethu odinkile
mme ketle le tsela tsa tsenetu tseding
mme kere na ketle le tsona
mme utsebe ke ena eo kereng
mme hakere utlatla le poone engwe
mme ake ubone engwe eseebileele ena
